title: Temporary Dom
description: WARNING: This book is borderline dark and not for the faint of heart.Luke Isaak, the drummer for Blood Rights is on a mission. Machala Winters got away once and Luke is determined it will never happen again. She’s perfect for his sadistic proclivities.Machala knows what she wants and if Luke would accept her submission and stop prying into her past, he would be at the top of the list. Some things are meant to stay buried and a certain Dom needs to respect her privacy.Sometimes love hurts in more ways than one. And sometimes a Dom holds a girl’s heart forever.
author: Holly S. Roberts
